cause.description:
The Sekai wo Ooini Moriagerutame no Suzumiya Haruhi no Dan, or SOS Brigade for short, is a group dedicated to solving mysteries of the supernatural that plague our society.
If anyone knows of any aliens, time-travelers, or espers, refer them to the creator of this cause, please!
1. Supernatural mysteries must be inspected and resolved!
2. Extraordinary beings must flock to the Leader of the SOS Brigade!
3. The SOS Brigade's world domination is inevitable!
cause.name: The SOS Brigade's Successful World Domination
